senses.sense_definition: A fan who supports multiple K-pop groups rather than just one; a short form of <w>multistan</w>.

examples.text: She describes herself as a <w>multi</w> because she loves many different bands.
As a <w>multi</w>, he enjoys music from various groups without choosing a favorite.

senses.sense_definition: A bidding convention in the card game bridge that indicates one of several possible types of hands.

examples.text: My partner opened the game with a <w>multi</w> to signal her hand strength.
Using the <w>multi</w> convention can make the bidding process more complex for opponents.

senses.sense_definition: An extinct rodent-like mammal from the Mesozoic era; a short form of <w>multituberculate</w>.

examples.text: The small <w>multi</w> lived alongside dinosaurs millions of years ago.
Fossils indicate that the <w>multi</w> was generally small in size.

senses.sense_definition: A small shell-dwelling fish popular in aquariums; a short form of <w>Neolamprologus multifasciatus</w>.

examples.text: He bought a new tank to breed a colony of <w>multies</w>.
The <w>multi</w> is known for hiding inside empty snail shells for protection.
